java/liquibase/database/template/ColumnMapRowMapper.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.util.JdbcUtils;
00004 
00005 import java.sql.ResultSet;
00006 import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;
00007 import java.sql.SQLException;
00008 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00009 import java.util.Map;
00010 
00023 @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
00024 class ColumnMapRowMapper implements RowMapper {
00025 
00026     public Object mapRow(ResultSet rs, int rowNum) throws SQLException {
00027         ResultSetMetaData rsmd = rs.getMetaData();
00028         int columnCount = rsmd.getColumnCount();
00029         Map mapOfColValues = createColumnMap(columnCount);
00030         for (int i = 1; i <= columnCount; i++) {
00031             String key = getColumnKey(rsmd.getColumnName(i));
00032             Object obj = getColumnValue(rs, i);
00033             mapOfColValues.put(key, obj);
00034         }
00035         return mapOfColValues;
00036     }
00037 
00044     protected Map createColumnMap(int columnCount) {
00045         return new LinkedHashMap(columnCount);
00046     }
00047 
00055     protected String getColumnKey(String columnName) {
00056         return columnName;
00057     }
00058 
00069     protected Object getColumnValue(ResultSet rs, int index) throws SQLException {
00070         return JdbcUtils.getResultSetValue(rs, index);
00071     }
00072 
00073 }
